summary: Provides NVTX (NVIDIA Tools Extension) utilities for MONAI, including a context manager and decorators that automatically push and pop NVTX ranges around functions, modules, optimizers, datasets, and other callable objects to enable fine‑grained GPU performance profiling.
business_intent: Facilitates performance analysis and optimization of MONAI deep‑learning pipelines by integrating NVIDIA profiling capabilities, helping developers identify bottlenecks and improve runtime efficiency on GPU hardware.
